snippet.title: OFF Translation v2.0 Trailer (Out Now!!)
snippet.description:
After several delays, v2.0 of the OFF English translation is finally out! Go join the Batter in his quest to purify the world in this quirky French Indie RPG game by Mortis Ghost!

Download the OFF Translation v2.0 here:
http://www.2shared.com/file/q5LfIihi/Off_translation_V_20.html
Or here:
http://www.sendspace.com/file/mkn1hv

Bonus Extras:
http://forum.starmen.net/forum/Fan/Games/OFF-by-Mortis-Ghost/page/3#post1907821

Talk about OFF Here:
http://forum.starmen.net/forum/Fan/Games/OFF-by-Mortis-Ghost/page/1/

Official OFF DeviantArt Group:
http://worldofoff.deviantart.com/

Hope you enjoy!

OFF by Mortis Ghost
Over the Rainbow written by Harold Arlen and E.Y. Harburg
